attacks.name: Focus Blast
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spike Lariat
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.
